In order to have a great flying experience, calibrate your phone sensors. Calibrating it, the magic algorithm will know what are the minimum and maximum values of your phone\'s sensors, so we\'ll make your drone fly to its next stage.
It\'s the time to move your phone in all its axis, doing the natural movement you think it\'s good to fly. Don\'t overrotate the phone!

In order to have a great flying experience, calibrate your drone sensors. Usually they\'re actually well calibrated. To check its calibration, place the drone in a neutral zone, like a flat stable table, and check for a 0 pitch and 0 roll values. If they don\'t show a double 0, tap the button and wait for 20 seconds without doing absolutely nothing.

The easier way to make drone fly is to have it sync\'d with your phone. So, put your drone in a flat stable table, and get your phone with your hand, heading to the same orientation. Then, tap the button. The phone and the drone will be instantly sync\'d.
To arm the drone, tap the \'volume up\' button of the phone. To disarm it again, tap the \'volume down\'.
